医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
科学家开发出检测蛋白质修饰的突破性技术由牛津大学领导的科学家团队在检测蛋白质结构修饰方面取得了重大突破。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Scientists-develop-breakthrough-technology-for-detecting- Protein-modifications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Scientists-develop-breakthrough-technology-for-detecting- Protein-modifications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25125b38-a0df-4fb1-8c27-f082c10b0ec2 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 14:01:29 -0400 Scientists develop breakthrough technology for detecting protein modifications
搬到污染地区可能会导致儿童体重增加加泰罗尼亚的一项大型自然实验表明，搬到空气污染程度较高的地区与幼儿体重增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Moving-to-polluted-areas-can-lead-to-weight-gain-in-kids.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Moving-to-polluted-areas-can-lead-to-weight-gain-in-kids.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=04395552-c8b4-4d79-971e-dfe28dde5890 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 13:56:30 -0400 Moving to polluted areas can lead to weight gain in kids
耗资 300 万英镑的新研究机构致力于解决痴呆症问题DeNPRU 获得英国国家健康与护理研究所 (NIHR) 300 万英镑的资助，将开展预防、诊断和治疗、护理服务以及劳动力需求方面的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/New-c2a33-million-research-unit-seeks-to-tackle-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/New-c2a33-million-research-unit-seeks-to-tackle-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30aa0bd0-0d51-4597-ac6d-26b82a572913 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 13:52:05 -0400 New £3 million research unit seeks to tackle dementia
调查凸显孕产妇健康知识存在巨大差距大多数人都知道怀孕期间吸烟或饮酒是不安全的，而且大多数人都知道孕妇对自己健康的照顾程度会影响婴儿的健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Survey-highlights-substantial-gaps-in-knowledge-about-maternal-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Survey-highlights-substantial-gaps-in-knowledge-about-maternal-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=19646a14-06d2-4e30-8548-59556b360150 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 13:48:39 -0400 Survey highlights substantial gaps in knowledge about maternal health
计算机算法可以帮助跟踪和诊断牙周病随着美国人口老龄化，牙周病在美国成为一个日益严重的公共卫生问题，但牙周病的诊断和治疗不足。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Computer-algorithms-could-help-track-and-diagnose-periodontal-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Computer-algorithms-could-help-track-and-diagnose-periodontal-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9977edc6-1cf5-4b50-8f80-8e0f643a819d Tue, 01 Aug 2023 13:45:47 -0400 Computer algorithms could help track and diagnose periodontal disease
一期临床试验正在进行中，以测试希望之城开发的癌症治疗方法美国最大的癌症研究和治疗组织之一希望之城的研究人员今天发表了一项新研究，解释了他们如何采用一种曾经被认为对靶向治疗来说太具有挑战性的蛋白质、增殖细胞核抗原 (PCNA) 和开发了一种靶向化疗，在临床前研究中似乎可以消灭所有实体瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Phase-1-clinical-trial-underway-to-test-City-of-Hope-development-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Phase-1-clinical-trial-underway-to-test-City-of-Hope-development-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a68fa5dc-e886-4604-812d-88bcc8f0f6e2 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 13:42:10 -0400 Phase 1 clinical trial underway to test City of Hope-developed cancer treatment
数百万患有烟草相关肺病的美国人可能被误诊根据加州大学旧金山分校研究人员领导的一项新研究，数百万患有烟草相关肺病的美国人的症状不符合任何现有的烟草相关疾病标准，包括最常见的慢性阻塞性肺病 (COPD) 。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Millions-of-Americans-with-tobacco-lated-lung-disease-may-be-misdiagnosed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Millions-of-Americans-with-tobacco-lated-lung-disease-may-be-misdiagnosed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9c54caf-2bf8-4662-8ba2-5b9aaf9351f7 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 13:34:29 -0400 Millions of Americans with tobacco-related lung disease may be misdiagnosed
新的基于血浆蛋白的生物标志物可以识别有心理健康问题风险的青少年东芬兰大学的研究人员发现了基于血浆蛋白的生物标志物，能够识别有出现心理健康问题风险的青少年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/New-plasma- Protein-based-biomarkers-can-identify-adolescents-at-risk-of-mental-health-problems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/New-plasma- Protein-based-biomarkers-can-identify-adolescents-at-risk-of-mental-health-problems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=12eeda7b-d6c2-472a-b86e-242249eeff68 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 13:04:32 -0400 New plasma protein-based biomarkers can identify adolescents at risk of mental health problems
HIPRA Human Health 的新型 COVID-19 疫苗获得 MHRA 批准Bimervax 是 HIPRA Human Health 开发的 COVID-19 疫苗，今天已获得药品和保健品监管机构 (MHRA) 的授权。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/New-COVID-19-vaccine-from-HIPRA-Human-Health-approved-by-MHRA.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/New-COVID-19-vaccine-from-HIPRA-Human-Health-approved-by-MHRA.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61236f25-c4a8-434d-b957-723e52c3ac25 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 12:58:42 -0400 New COVID-19 vaccine from HIPRA Human Health approved by MHRA
老年女性结直肠癌幸存者可能会经历多年持续的胃肠道症状一项新的研究表明，超过五分之四的老年结直肠癌幸存者可能在诊断和治疗多年后出现一系列胃肠道症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Older-female-colorectal-cancer-survivors-may-experience-persistent-GI-symptoms-for-years.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Older-female-colorectal-cancer-survivors-may-experience-persistent-GI-symptoms-for-years.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b74ed9c2-b802-42b1-bd69-d6490de8658f Tue, 01 Aug 2023 12:56:05 -0400 Older female colorectal cancer survivors may experience persistent GI symptoms for years
